product_overview: Molhem Book Store is a comprehensive web-based e-commerce platform tailored specifically for the digital book industry. It supports multi-format products including physical books, e-books, and audiobooks, integrated publishing and design services, multi-language and currency support, and a robust order, payment, and shipping management system.
core_goals: Provide a unified marketplace for physical books, e-books, and audiobooks with seamless purchase and consumption experiences.
Offer end-to-end publishing services including manuscript submission, editorial review, design, and distribution for authors and publishers.
Enable multi-language (Arabic and English) and multi-currency support to serve a broad Arabic-speaking market and beyond.
Implement advanced order management with smart checkout, real-time tracking, and comprehensive shipping options.
Support diverse payment methods through a unified payment system integrating multiple payment gateways and installment plans.
Ensure high security standards with role-based access control, data encryption, and PCI DSS compliance.
Deliver a responsive, accessible, and culturally sensitive user experience across devices and platforms.
key_features: Dashboard Management for administrators encompassing books, orders, users, analytics, and store settings.
Complete Book Management system supporting physical books, e-books, and audiobooks with sample preview capabilities.
Shopping Cart and Checkout functionality with persistent cart, price calculation, and guest checkout options.
Unified Payment System integrating Stripe, PayPal, Tabby installment plans, and Cash on Delivery methods.
Comprehensive Order Management covering order lifecycle, status tracking, modification, and notifications.
User Authentication and Role-Based Management including email/social login, profile management, and loyalty programs.
Content Management with rich text editing supporting blogs, FAQs, and digital content previews.
Advanced Search and Navigation with multi-category filtering, author management, and recommendation engine.
Internationalization and Currency Management supporting Arabic/English localization and dynamic currency conversion.
Shipping and Logistics with multiple carrier integrations, weight-based pricing, and regional delivery options.
Subscription Management for recurring payments and premium content access.
File Upload and Management using Firebase Storage for handling images and digital book files.
Analytics and Reporting dashboards for business intelligence and store performance monitoring.
Error Handling and Logging centralized across the platform for enhanced reliability.
UI Components library built with Radix UI and custom React components ensuring design consistency.
Legal compliance pages including Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, Return and Shipping Policies.
Publishing and Design Services portal facilitating author manuscript submission, book design, and promotional materials.
user_flow_summary: User visits homepage, browses catalog by categories, authors, or search results.
User views detailed book pages with options to read or listen to samples and reviews.
User adds items to a persistent shopping cart and proceeds to checkout with smart form auto-fill.
User selects shipping method and payment option from multiple gateways and completes the purchase.
System sends order confirmation and provides real-time tracking updated via integrated shipping providers.
Registered users manage profiles, addresses, payment methods, and view order history and loyalty points.
Publishers and authors submit manuscripts, track publishing workflows, and manage their catalogs.
Administrators access dashboards for analytics, order processing, content updates, and system settings.
validation_criteria: All core functionalities including shopping cart, checkout, and payment processing must pass unit and integration tests.
Multi-language and currency features must correctly render and convert content across supported locales.
Order lifecycle must correctly reflect status changes with accurate real-time tracking and notifications.
Publishing and design service workflows must support file uploads, review stages, and approvals successfully.
Security standards including authentication, authorization, data encryption, and PCI compliance must be verified via security audits.
Performance metrics including page load times, backend response times, and error rates must meet defined SLAs.
User experience must comply with WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards including RTL support and keyboard navigation.
System must demonstrate scalability under load with automatic failover and recovery mechanisms enabled.
Payment system must support all integrated providers with failover, refunds, and fraud detection fully operational.
Analytics and reporting dashboards must accurately reflect real-time business data with correct visualization.
